verbose_text: According to Sorensen and Morensen, the following strategies for improving the solubility of proteins without engineering the target was suggested : to investigate various temperatures, strains, media, molecular chaperones or include tRNA complementation plasmids.26 An optimized expression medium and autoinduction protocol at 20 degreesC (SI Figure S4) as described by Studier showed the best results for CARs in our previous studies and was used as our expression standard.28 Improvement of CAR Expression Levels.
